query:
UPDATE visitacoes 
SET codigo = CONCAT(
  'VIS',
  DATE_FORMAT(dataVisita, '%d%m%y'),
  '-',
  UPPER(SUBSTRING(REPLACE(REPLACE(nome, ' ', ''), '.', ''), 1, 3))
)
WHERE codigo IS NULL;
command:

  '-',
